content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Copper Cable Factory at Position(2.5, 17.5)
Consists of:
– A cable factory input chest at Position(2.5, 17.5)
– A factory burner inserter placed at Position(3.5, 17.5) using direction RIGHT
– An additional burner inserter (fuelled with coal) at Position(1.5, 17.5)
– A burner inserter awaiting source items at Position(2.5, 16.5)
– An assembling machine (assembling-machine-1) at Position(1.5, 19.5)

### Depot Belt System at Position(3.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
– A wooden chest serving as the belt depot at Position(3.5, 15.5)
– A dedicated transport belt segment placed adjacent at Position(4.5, 15.5)
– A depot burner inserter positioned at (3.5, 14.5) using direction UP

### Extraction System Interface at Position(–3.5, 27.5)
Consists of:
– The extraction system burner inserter located at Position(–3.5, 27.5) with its drop position at (–3.5, 28.5)

### Electricity Generator Setup at Position(–0.5, 24.5)
Consists of:
– A steam engine (generator) at Position(–0.5, 24.5)
– A boiler at Position(–5.5, 24.0)
– An offshore pump at Position(–7.5, 25.5)

### Iron Plate Smelting Unit at Position(–3.0, 19.0)
Consists of:
– A stone furnace at Position(–3.0, 19.0) producing iron plates
– An adjacent wooden chest at Position(–4.5, 18.5)

### Copper Plate Smelting Unit at Position(–4.0, 21.0)
Consists of:
– A stone furnace at Position(–4.0, 21.0) producing copper plates
– A wooden chest at Position(–5.5, 21.5)

### Research Lab at Position(Not Specified)
Consists of:
– A lab accepting automation science packs (lab_input: {'automation-science-pack': 17}) with electrical_id 7106 and currently no power

ERROR TIPS
──────────
– When connecting transport belts, the target must not be a steam engine object. Always interpose an inserter that supplies items into the steam engine rather than connecting directly.
– For placement errors showing “target position is too far,” ensure the player moves within the maximum allowed distance before attempting placement.
– When an item is reported missing in inventory (for example, no wooden chest found), verify that the inventory contains the required entity prior to placement.
– To avoid NameError issues (such as an undefined variable for the target chest), confirm that all variables are correctly defined and referenced before use.
